name: api_input_Gyroscope

properties.name: attitude
properties.description: Returns the attitude (ie, orientation in space) of the device.

properties.name: enabled
properties.description: Sets or retrieves the enabled status of this gyroscope.

properties.name: gravity
properties.description: Returns the gravity acceleration vector expressed in the device's reference frame.

properties.name: rotationRate
properties.description: Returns rotation rate as measured by the device's gyroscope.

properties.name: rotationRateUnbiased
properties.description: Returns unbiased rotation rate as measured by the device's gyroscope.

properties.name: updateInterval
properties.description: Sets or retrieves gyroscope interval in seconds.

properties.name: userAcceleration
properties.description: Returns the acceleration that the user is giving to the device.
